EmailTemplate.subject: Invitation to The Challenge Society - Reaching Communities introduction evening
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Now you've completed NCS with The Challenge, you can take part in The Challenge Society's social action programme Reaching Communities, happening in your area this autumn/winter! If you've missed out on an Ignite ticket, this is another great way to stay involved with The Challenge!
An introductory evening is taking place on Thursday 6th November, from 6pm - 8pm at Pastures Youth Centre, 15 Davies Lane, Leytonstone, E11 3DR. To secure your FREE ticket to the event, click on the following link and register: http://goo.gl/U7X2XA
Want to stay in touch with your mates from NCS? Build your skills and expertise in running a project? Get Â£400 to make an impact in your community?
Then come along and find out all about Reaching Communities! There'll be free treats, fun, games and the chance to meet your new team and think about making a difference in your community. Call 07785 623339 for more info!
Best wishes,
Sam
